msbt.message: See, the thing is, I kind of have a lot on my mind right nowI need some time to myself to think. Can we pick this up again later?
Look, I'm really sorry, but I have a lot of things I need to do today.Perhaps we can save the chitchat for another time? ?
I'm sorry, but I've got a lot on my plate right now. I need some peace and quiet to think about all of it.
